# Code Examples

Here are some code examples with hash characters inside.

## Python Example

```python
# This is a comment in Python
def hello():
    # Another comment
    print("Hello, world!")

# Main entry point
if __name__ == "__main__":
    hello()
```

## Bash Example

```bash
# Install dependencies
npm install

# Run the build
npm run build

# Start the server
npm start
```

## Markdown in Code Blocks

```markdown
# This is a heading inside a code block
## This should NOT be treated as a heading
### Neither should this
```

Regular text after the code blocks.
